author: Phil
content:
Peter, I’ve seen an autopsy video on line, (YouTube I think) not as made as you make it out to be. Ever go hunting and dress-out an animal, same thing except this time its a human.
You are dead, after the autopsy, there is nothing left of you but the outer shell and bones, “everything” is removed.

author: Peter Wright
content:
This was Kim’s last assignment before she and her partner moved to the far east for a new and exciting life. She was interviewing this “celebrity about a rocket he was going to design and launch.

Kim’s head and legs were found by divers in a weighted bag the following October.

It is not just what these sick people do, it is the heroes that go looking for, and find, the evidence and they that have to do an autopsy and report their grim findings that is just so awful in a case like this.

An eye for an eye.

author: Willy
content: Must have a really big ego to think he would get away with what he did.
